title: Understanding Facebook's Antitrust Case Win
itunes:title: Understanding Facebook's Antitrust Case Win
description:
Jim Anderson, CEO of SocialFlow, discusses Facebook's antitrust case victory. Janelle Woodward, President of MacKay Shields, talks markets. Scott Freeman, Co-Founder and Partner at JST Capital, discusses the latest news from the crypto space. George Ferguson, Senior Aerospace, Defense & Airlines Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, talks about United Airlines' big purchase. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
